rows.label: tev001591_MSG0001
rows.name:
Did the backwater peasants who raised you neglect
to teach you basic manners? It's considered impolite
to interrupt at teatime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0002
rows.name:
You seem somewhat dubious that I am actually
enjoying tea at the moment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0003
rows.name:
Well, I assure you, this is a fine cup of Ceylon tea.
Or as fine as any knock-off manufactured here
in New LA, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_JNK0010
rows.name: Request

rows.label: tev001591_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask to join the Murderess for tea.

rows.label: tev001591_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev001591_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask the Murderess about the man she's with.

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0004
rows.name:
If you leave me alone, we can split a ration at
some point down the road and call it dinner. Deal?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0005
rows.name:
We're in the middle of an important conversation,
and it really can't be interrupted. Bye now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0006
rows.name: Let's say he's a business partner of mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0007
rows.name:
We're in the middle of an important conversation,
and it really can't be interrupted. Bye now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_JNK0110
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev001591_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask the Murderess what they're discussing.

rows.label: tev001591_JNK0120
rows.name: Doubt

rows.label: tev001591_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask the Murderess if this is another of her evil schemes.

rows.label: tev001591_JNK0130
rows.name: Appeal

rows.label: tev001591_SEL0131
rows.name: Ask the Murderess if you can get in on the action.

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0008
rows.name: I'm afraid that's a secret.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0009
rows.name:
But I assure you, no one is being cheated,
and no one is in danger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0010
rows.name: I'm just...buying a dream, you could say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0011
rows.name:
But I'm afraid I can't say anything more than that.
We'll speak in the administrative district once there's
an actual BLADE mission to discuss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0012
rows.name: Until then, good-bye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0013
rows.name:
Is that how you think of me? That is shocking,
appalling, and not in any way unreasonable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0014
rows.name:
But I'll have you know that our new venture does not
involve deceiving or endangering anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0015
rows.name: I'm just...buying a dream, you could say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0016
rows.name:
But I'm afraid I can't say anything more than that.
We'll speak in the administrative district once there's
an actual BLADE mission to discuss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0017
rows.name: Until then, good-bye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0018
rows.name:
Are you a hyena dressed as a[ST:gender p1= man p2= woman ]?
I make the kill, yet you desire a share of the meat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0019
rows.name:
You have to be careful about horning in on every
money-making scheme you discover.
It can be bad for your health.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0020
rows.name:
Go find your own money. And maybe some self-respect
while you're at it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0021
rows.name:
I don't wish to speak any more of this venture.
We'll catch up in the administrative district
once there are BLADE missions to discuss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001591_MSG0022
rows.name: Until then, good-bye.[ST:wait ]
